price: 42.Diggah atu Yi naqoosay qibaada yoh caglissa makkossaamih dudda ken amol mantu, kinnih immay atu makot beytaamih dudda kah litom makkoote maray koo kataate kaak iyye Yalli.
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun illā mani ittabaʿaka mina al-ghāwīna
